actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude interest from the gross income of individuals to the extent that the principal amount on which the interest is earned does not exceed $50,000.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income qualified interest to the extent that the principal amount on which the interest is earned does not exceed $50,000.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude interest from the gross income of individuals to the extent that the principal amount on which the interest is earned does not exceed $50,000.
